column5: I had 20 fish head jigs I needed painted up. I wanted only one guy to paint them. James the MEEGS guy. I was so impressed with what he had done, I needed to share his work, and his NEW meegs for this year.  I did up 4 for now with buck tail. Goby and shinner. Will use them for lakers and white fish.   His new meegs, is very detailed and well, I cant wait to use them this winter.   This guy knows how. Great job James and thanks again buddy.
Thanks bud. You do know half are yours.LOL  I didnt want to choke the hook with a bunch of hair. Still want to be able to put on a swim bait.
There's no doubt he does fine work.
oh yeah.Â  cant wait to try them
Sweet looking Jigs! I need to make a trip to Barrie
